FAQ.Question: Is this suitable for beginners?
FAQ.Answer: No. It is intended for students with solid Qur’an reading skills.

FAQ.Question: Can I enroll without prior recitation experience?
FAQ.Answer: No. Basic mastery of Qur’an recitation is required.

FAQ.Question: Do I need to memorize Tajwīd rules?
FAQ.Answer: No. Tajwīd is applied naturally through guided practice.

FAQ.Question: Will I be ready to teach others after this course?
FAQ.Answer: Yes. The course prepares you for both recitation and instruction.

FAQ.Question: How are mistakes corrected?
FAQ.Answer: With calm guidance and repeated correction — never pressure.
